类型: Fit Type: Wide LegSize: 14 YearsColor: Set 3
评论详情: I am 5’1” 140 lbs. I got these for myself. I wear a women’s medium but I have a smaller behind and kids clothes tend to fit me. I don’t love the graphics but they’re not super big or loud so it’s not a deal breaker. They’re a great price for a 3 pack.

类型: Fit Type: Loose JoggersSize: 12 YearsColor: Set 2
评论详情: These EXARUS 3 Pack Girls' Letter Graphic Print Sweatpants have "CALIFORNLA" printed on them. They are thinner than sweatpants, but fit as expected. 类型: Fit Type: Loose JoggersSize: 6 YearsColor: Set 2

Overall, I'm pleased with the quality and fit of these sweatpants for my 6-year-old, making them a fantastic choice for comfortable and stylish everyday wear.

I may have to hem them up a little bit as they are dragging the ground before she can actually get good use out of them. The legs are wide enough that you can't roll them up where they would stay. Other than that, I could honestly see her living in these with just a simple t-shirt.

类型: Fit Type: Wide LegSize: 14 YearsColor: Set 3
评论详情: I'm 58 and a size 10 jeans.  I figured that I could fit these and wanted some cute, fitted loungers/joggers so decided to take a chance.  All my other loungers/joggers are loose fit and didn't accent my shape.  So glad I tried these.  They fit GREAT.  They are super comfortable.  Not too thick or thin.  Have pockets and are super cute.  I'm 5 5" and they fall right to my shoes.  I'm very happy with these.

类型: Fit Type: Slim JoggersSize: 8 YearsColor: Set 1
评论详情: My 9 year old has recently decided she'll no longer wear leggings and will only wear sweatpants. Now that the weather is turning colder, I need to stock up with something she'll actually wear. This three pack works well. She's sort of inbetween sizes, so I sized down this time because she's really slim and gets frustrated with baggy waists. The waist size on the 8 is perfect without needing the drawstring, but either way, I'm glad that the drawstring is adjustable rather than decorative. We might need that once these are handed down to her sisters. The length is a smidge short when she moves, otherwise it sits perfectly at her ankle. It's fine for her. She'll probably end up wearing the lighter color ones for pajama bottoms anyways. I'm still saying the sizing is as expected since I know we sized down.  Best feature: functional pockets!

类型: Fit Type: Wide LegSize: 8 YearsColor: Set 3
评论详情: I got these for my six year old, I got her the 8 because I was worried 6 would be too small. They’re a little big on her so I’d say they run true to size. They’re good quality, nice strong elastic waist. The material is kind of like a sweatpants but not thick at all. They were a little long on her since I sized up one so I rolled the waistband and she is able to wear them. She says they’re loose and comfy. I would recommend these! Good quality.

类型: Fit Type: Slim JoggersSize: 6 YearsColor: Set 1
评论详情: I’m always nervous ordering pants for my little one online. She’s short for her age but the elastic on the ankles fits well so she has room to grow into these. The waistband fits a little snug at first so we had to stretch them a little bit first. Best part about this set is it’s so easy to mix and match tops with. The font on the pants is multicolor so really any shirt can pair well with them.

类型: Fit Type: Loose JoggersSize: 8 YearsColor: Set 2
评论详情: Quality materials, fits well. Great buy.
